section_title: Amendment of section 11 of 38 & 39  Vict.  c. 89 as to term for repayment of loans.
section_text: 4 In section eleven of the Public Works Loans Act, 1875  , as amended by section five of the Public Works Loans Act, 1898, fifty years shall be substituted for thirty years as the maximum period for the repayment of a loan in a case where no period for repayment is specified by the special Act relating to the loan.
5 This Act may be cited as the Public Works Loans Act 1911.
